sentences.en: “We’ve learned quite a lot, ” said K.A. Monney, a professor in the university’s entomology and wildlife department.
sentences.cn: “我们学到了很多，”该大学的昆虫学和野生动物系教授K·A·曼尼说。

sentences.en: Botany, Entomology Herpetology, mammalogy, and ornithology.
sentences.cn: 收藏植物学 、 虫学、虫学 、 乳动物学和鸟类学.

sentences.en: But the bees are not as happy as they sound, which is why Mr Wardell, who has a PhD in entomology and is a de facto bee doctor, is here.
sentences.cn: 然而蜂群并不像听上去那么快乐，这也是沃代尔先生——这位昆虫学博士和货真价实的蜜蜂大夫——来到此地的原因。

sentences.en: Collect paleontology, entomology, zoology, biology, and anthropology.
sentences.cn: 收藏古生物学 、 昆虫学 、 动物学 、 生物学及人类学.

sentences.en: He decided to specialize in entomology after graduation.
sentences.cn: 他决定毕业后专攻昆虫学.

sentences.en: Research opportunities exist in a wide range of pure and applied areas of entomology.
sentences.cn: 纯理论昆虫学和应用昆虫学的众多领域都存在着研究机会。

sentences.en: The study of plant resistance to insects dates back to earliest days of applied entomology.
sentences.cn: 早在应用昆虫学发展的初期,就已开始植物抗虫性的研究.

sentences.en: This is a web page of Abstracts of Entomology.
sentences.cn: 这是昆虫学文摘数据库所在的网页.
